channel.title: maintenance on IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in maintenance on IT Quicktasks

item.title: Drupal maintenance mode (turn-off) via drush
item.description: Drupal 8 drush sset system.maintenance_mode FALSE Drupal 7 drush vset maintenance_mode 0 You may need to clear cache for it to work. See details and some other options if it doesn’t work in https://drupal.stackexchange.com/questions/100771/how-do-i-turn-off-maintenance-mode
